trans-unit.source: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.
trans-unit.target: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.

trans-unit.source: Create platform-specific descriptions
trans-unit.target: Create platform-specific descriptions

trans-unit.source: Create platform-specific descriptions
trans-unit.target: Create platform-specific descriptions

trans-unit.source: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.
trans-unit.target: If you've provided packages targeting different operating systems, you have the option to customize parts of your description for different targeted operating systems.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Customers on Windows 10 will always see your default description.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Customers on Windows 10 will always see your default description.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to mention features that appear only in one OS version, or want to provide screenshots that are specific to a particular OS (independent of device type), rather than having all customers see the same description.
trans-unit.target: This is useful if you want to mention features that appear only in one OS version, or want to provide screenshots that are specific to a particular OS (independent of device type), rather than having all customers see the same description.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Creating a platform-specific description in one language does not create a platform-specific description in other languages that your app supports, even if you have [entered description info](create-app-descriptions.md) for those languages.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Creating a platform-specific description in one language does not create a platform-specific description in other languages that your app supports, even if you have [entered description info](create-app-descriptions.md) for those languages.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to create the platform-specific description separately for each language.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to create the platform-specific description separately for each language.

trans-unit.source: Creating a platform-specific description
trans-unit.target: Creating a platform-specific description

trans-unit.source: Near the top of your **Description** page, you'll see a link to **create a platform-specific app description**.
trans-unit.target: Near the top of your **Description** page, you'll see a link to **create a platform-specific app description**.

trans-unit.source: When you click this link, a popup will appear asking you to choose from your supported targeted operating systems.
trans-unit.target: When you click this link, a popup will appear asking you to choose from your supported targeted operating systems.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 is not included in the list of choices, because customers on Windows 10 will always see the app's default description.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 is not included in the list of choices, because customers on Windows 10 will always see the app's default description.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you haven't provided packages targeting multiple OS versions, or if you've already created platform-specific descriptions for all of the OS versions your app targets, you won't be able to make a selection.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If you haven't provided packages targeting multiple OS versions, or if you've already created platform-specific descriptions for all of the OS versions your app targets, you won't be able to make a selection.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to use your default description as a starting point, which will bring over all of the text and images you've entered for your default description; you'll then be able to make any changes you'd like before saving.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to use your default description as a starting point, which will bring over all of the text and images you've entered for your default description; you'll then be able to make any changes you'd like before saving.

trans-unit.source: You can also start from a completely blank description if you prefer.
trans-unit.target: You can also start from a completely blank description if you prefer.

trans-unit.source: After you click **Continue**, your **Description** page will now include a section for the platform-specific description you've just created (underneath the [Default description](create-app-descriptions.md#default-description-fields) section).
trans-unit.target: After you click **Continue**, your **Description** page will now include a section for the platform-specific description you've just created (underneath the [Default description](create-app-descriptions.md#default-description-fields) section).

trans-unit.source: This section will include its own set of fields for **Description** (required), **Release notes**, **Screenshots**, **App tile icon**, **App features**, and **Recommended hardware**.
trans-unit.target: This section will include its own set of fields for **Description** (required), **Release notes**, **Screenshots**, **App tile icon**, **App features**, and **Recommended hardware**.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to enter info into each field where you want to display info in the custom description, even if it's the same info as in your default description.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to enter info into each field where you want to display info in the custom description, even if it's the same info as in your default description.

trans-unit.source: If you leave any of these fields blank, no info will appear for that field in the custom description.
trans-unit.target: If you leave any of these fields blank, no info will appear for that field in the custom description.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Not all fields of your app's description can be customized for a specific targeted OS.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Not all fields of your app's description can be customized for a specific targeted OS.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [Shared fields](create-app-descriptions.md#shared-fields).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [Shared fields](create-app-descriptions.md#shared-fields).

trans-unit.source: Removing a platform-specific description
trans-unit.target: Removing a platform-specific description

trans-unit.source: If you create a platform-specific description and later decide you'd rather show your default description to customers on that operating system, click the **Delete** link.
trans-unit.target: If you create a platform-specific description and later decide you'd rather show your default description to customers on that operating system, click the **Delete** link.

trans-unit.source: After confirming that you'd like to show those customers your default description, click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: After confirming that you'd like to show those customers your default description, click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: The platform-specific description will be removed.
trans-unit.target: The platform-specific description will be removed.

trans-unit.source: If you decide you want it back later, you can always create a new platform-specific description for that operating system by following the steps listed above.
trans-unit.target: If you decide you want it back later, you can always create a new platform-specific description for that operating system by following the steps listed above.
